title: Call of Duty (2003) PC | Repack
description:
||| Description: 
 Title: Call of Duty 1 
 Publication Type: RePack 
 Genre: Shooter, Action, Action FPS, 3D, 1st Person 
 Developer: Activision / Infinity Ward 
 Year: 2003 
 Platform: PC 
 Version: 1.0b 
 Language: English 
 Tablet: Not required


||| System requirements: 
 Operating system: Windows 2000 / Microsoft XP / Vista / Se7en / Windows 8 
 Processor: Pentium III or AMD (R) Athlon (TM) 64 3200 + or higher 
 Memory: 128MB (512GB for Windows Vista) 
 Video Card: 128MB NVIDIA (R) GeForce (R) 4 and higher or ATI Radeon (TM) 9200SE and   above 
 Sound card: compatible with DirectX (R) 9.0c 
 Free space on hard disk: 1.44 GB 
 Multiplayer: Internet connection required constant

||| About: 
 Call of Duty - a computer game in the genre of first-person shooter on the Second   World War, the first game in the series of the same name. 
 The game was developed by Infinity Ward and published by Activision October 29, 2003    Platform PC. 
 The game is based on the engine Id Tech 3.


||| Additional Information:

# To play you must have installed NET. Framework 2.0 SP1 and above and Visual C + + ...

# Installed in the game is in the folder. Registration in the system registry is not required.

# Windows 7 and Windows 8 - for the correct operation of the game need to perform compatibility. 
Right click on CoDMP, choose properties, then compatibility, tick on the run in compatibility mode,,,,,, and in the dropdown menu select Windows xp sp 1,2 or 3, and click OK. 
# Run CoDSP single player or multiplayer CoDMP.
